SimBikeRace
===========

.. only:: html

This is a simple "dot racing" based simulatino of a bike race.  For educational purposes.

* (:mod:`bikerace`)--run a race.
* (:mod:`anim_race`)--display an animation of the race using pygame.

       .. rubric:: Table of Contents

.. toctree::
    :numbered:
    :maxdepth: 2

    documentation
